column5: Well...we had an awesome time out on Lake Simcoe today for the Fishing for Tyler event!  Bly and I brought our 4 year old daughter, Sydney, with us on this day.  We arrived at around 11am and headed straight out on the ice to meet up with Joey and Tybo...and a bunch of other OFNers.  The wind had died down at this point and it was quite comfortable out on the ice.  Here are some pics from the ice...  Bly watching over our setups   Here's the captain of team 9...Patb  Gerritt...thanks for the venison and other goodies!!! No matter what everyone else on the board says...you're a nice guy....LOL   Tybo...lost in thought.  He complained he never caught anything here before.  He also let me know that he'll catch all the big game fish for the tourney for our team (6).  I have to catch a carp apparently...LOL.   Concentrating on catching some fish!!! Fishnsled and Headhunter.   My daughter, Sydney, and Joey having a nice chat and staying warm in the Clam.   Sydney playing with the worms!!!   At 1pm, we headed in for some grub and to meet up with other OFNers. Here's a shot of the area...with lots of hungry ice anglers!   The awesome cooks!! Thanks a bunch!! BigCliff and Loonietoon   Here's MrJr taking a break from the cooking station.   After eating, we had the pleasure of talking with lots of members on the board.  Here are few shots....  Tonyb, Carp and Joey   Motv8tr, Big Chevy and Ladywalleye   And here's Irishfield...   After the prizes for the event were handed out, there were LOTS of draws.  I think everyone took something home!  Here's what we won...   There were lots of others we met out there today...Clampett, Pikeie, Beans, Terry, DMasse, BPS Bassman, Tracker, and lots of others that I know I've forgotten.  Sorry if I didn't mention you by name....but you know who you are...LOL.  Also had a quick chat with Tyler and his mom.  They thanked me for coming...but I thanked her...because we had an awesome time out there.  We just wanted to say thanks Motv8tr and everyone who volunteered at this great event.  We had a great day and got to meet lots of great people.
Thanks fer the report. I was speaking briefly with Irishfield and didn't know it was him!
Looks like a fun time, and a good cause to boot! One of these days if I can ever find the time, I'd love to attend one of these get togethers myself and meet some of you guys

Cliff, Bly and Sydney.... It was awesome to finally meet you and your wife... wow you are awesome people! Just what I would expect from OFC'rs! I would be honoured to have the both of you in my boat come june... and yes I promise just Iced Green tea for me when were out  I hope the both of you enjoy the venison!  Gerritt.
That is really good stuff, thanks...
Nice report and pics, looks like it was a successful event.  Did you get any fish ? who got the biggest fish of the day ?
GBayGiant...Hopefully Ron will chime in and let you know... I dont wanna spill the beans...He must be a proud man right now!   Gerritt.

I'm glad you guys made it out there Cliff and Carol.  And your daughter is just a sweetie.  She is welcome in my hut anytime.  Can you please tell me what her fav candies are (the white ones).  I tried to guess but couldn't come up with the right name and she couldn't remember     But they're the white ones in the blue package.  Cheers,  Joey
looked like fun nice report wish i was there but had to hit lake st clair have you ever had any luck ice fishing with worms i tried it before but they just freezed and was there any fish caught
fun day on the ice and a good cause
LOL...they are Mentos...she cant get enough of them.

You know Cliff, I guessed mentos and she said "I don't know" and i said are they the ones that come in a tube like package, and she asked "whats a tube" so we had a whole nother discussion about what a tube was     Seems she may have pulled the wool over this old broad's eyes eh.  Cheers,  Joey
Thanks Cliff ,I love the detailed report and the pics.Did I mention I loved the pics.  Joey take a roll of mentos and throw them into a bottle of diet coke.Stay close to the bottle.
Great report , looks like another great event!!

great report cliff,im glad your family had fun its great to see the kids out as well,  like i said in my other posts,everyone had fun and it was for a great cause,way to go.....very nice pics as well...cheers
Congrats to everyone, looks like it was a great day for a good cause.
Super report.  Really wish I'd made it out.  Will definitely look to support this great cause next year.
